notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: F.V. applied quantitative analysis to the full set of climate data (indices calculation, statistical analysis and reporting). G.B. wrote the main body of the manuscript and provided support in the definition of the indices and presentation of results. L.P. designed the experiment and provided knowledge on the weather generators of choice. E.M. simulated rice crops in the different environments. R.C. identified the topic of the research, designed the experiment and coordinated goals and strategies. All the authors contributed the final version of the manuscript.
